member.name: M:PegasusLib.BidirectionalDictionary`2.Add(`0,`1)
member.exception: An element with the same key or value already exists

member.summary: Throws if is zero
member.returns: The distance traveled before a tile was reached, or if the distance would exceed it

member.summary: Throws if is zero
member.returns: The distance traveled before a tile was reached, or if the distance would exceed it

member.name: M:PegasusLib.CollisionExt.GetCenterProjectedPoint(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Rectangle,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Vector2)
member.returns: The intersection point between a line segment connecting to the center of and

member.name: M:PegasusLib.CollisionExt.PolygonIntersectsRect(System.ValueTuple{Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Vector2,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Vector2}[],Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Rectangle)

member.name: T:PegasusLib.Config.NamedDefinitionConfigElement`1
member.summary: Respects
member.typeparam: The definition type which NamedDefinitionConfigElement should use

member.name: M:PegasusLib.Content.IRightClickableAccessory.CanRightClickAccessory(Terraria.Item[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: If this returns false, the slot's normal right click behavior will apply instead of

member.name: M:PegasusLib.Content.IRightClickableAccessory.RightClickAccessory(Terraria.Item[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: If this returns true, the accessory will be synced to other players

member.name: M:PegasusLib.DropRuleExt.FindDropRule``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Terraria.GameContent.ItemDropRules.IItemDropRule},System.Predicate{``0})
member.returns: The first matching in , or null if no matching rule was found

member.name: T:PegasusLib.FishingLootPool.FallthroughFishingCatch
member.summary: Used to denote that a rarity pool should have a chance to fail, even if it contains a valid item, such as catches with not always catching legendary fish

member.name: M:PegasusLib.FishingLootPool.FallthroughFishingCatch.#ctor(System.Func{Terraria.Player,Terraria.DataStructures.FishingAttempt,System.Boolean},System.Single)
member.summary: Used to denote that a rarity pool should have a chance to fail, even if it contains a valid item, such as catches with not always catching legendary fish

member.name: M:PegasusLib.FramingUtils.AutoFrame(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Byte)
member.param: upLeft, up, upRight, left, right, downLeft, down, downRight

member.name: M:PegasusLib.Graphics.GraphicsDeviceExtensions.UseOldRenderTargets(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.GraphicsDevice,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.RenderTargetBinding[])
member.summary: Sets the spritebatch to use some list of old render targets without clearing them

member.name: M:PegasusLib.Graphics.ShaderLayerTargetHandler.Capture(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.SpriteBatch)
member.summary: Begins capturing whatever is drawn to the spritebatch When used in a global, should be placed in the respective IDraw____Effect.PrepareToDraw____ hook, not PreDraw
member.param: the SpriteBatch to be used, leave as null to use

member.name: M:PegasusLib.Graphics.ShaderLayerTargetHandler.Stack(Terraria.Graphics.Shaders.ArmorShaderData,Terraria.Entity)
member.summary: Applies the shader to everything captured
member.param: the Entity to be used in

member.name: M:PegasusLib.Graphics.ShaderLayerTargetHandler.Stack(Terraria.Graphics.Shaders.MiscShaderData,System.Nullable{Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Matrix})
member.summary: Applies the shader to everything captured

member.name: M:PegasusLib.Graphics.ShaderLayerTargetHandler.Release
member.summary: Sets the spritebatch to its state before was called, then draws everything that was captured When used in a global, should be placed in the respective IDraw____Effect.FinishDrawing____ hook, not PostDraw

member.name: M:PegasusLib.Graphics.SpritebatchExt.GetState(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.SpriteBatch)
member.summary: Gets the current state of the as a
Restarts the spritebatch, using the provided values, any value not provided will use the respective value from spriteBatchState instead
Begin the spritebatch, using the provided values, any value not provided will use the respective value from spriteBatchState instead

member.name: M:PegasusLib.ICustomDrawItem.DrawOverHand(Terraria.Player)
member.summary: whether or not the item is drawn over the player's hand

member.name: M:PegasusLib.ICustomDrawItem.BackHand(Terraria.Player)
member.summary: whether or not the item is drawn in a layer further back than usual

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.None
member.summary: Doesn't move.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Slime
member.summary: Hops in one direction, slides on slopes, floats in water, follows player if damaged or it's nighttime. Grasshoppers, on the other hand, flees from nearby players.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Demon_Eye
member.summary: Flies, follows player, bounces off walls in an arc.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Fighter
member.summary: Will walk, jump over holes, follow player. It will try to line up vertically first. If it fails to reach its target, it will back up a bit, then re-attempt. It is the most common AI in Terraria.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Eye_of_Cthulhu
member.summary: Alternates between trying to stay above the player and summoning Servants of Cthulhu, and charging at the player occasionally. Spins when at low health, and begins exclusively charging at the player. Always looks at player.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Flying
member.summary: Flies, looks at player, follows player.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Worm
member.summary: Burrows in ground (and/or air), passes through blocks, follows player. Truffle Worm instead flees from players.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Passive
member.summary: "Walks semi-randomly, jumps over holes. As of the 1.3 update, all Town NPCs talk to each other and the player, and each Town NPC has a different weapon to defend themselves when an enemy is nearby."

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Caster
member.summary: Casts spells at player, stays stationary, warps after three casts, warps if falling. It stops casting spells if damaged, then warps if left alone.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Spell
member.summary: Travels in a direct line towards player, going through blocks. Used by casters.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Cursed_Skull
member.summary: Tries to drift towards or around player, often stays a little bit out of reach once having touched the player.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Head
member.summary: Tries to stay above player, spins and moves towards player occasionally, enrages during the daytime.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Skeletron_Hand
member.summary: Follows the Skeletron head, flails, waves, and attempts to damage player.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Plant
member.summary: Extends on a vine towards player, looks at player. Dies if not rooted to a block.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Bat
member.summary: Spasmodically flies towards player.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.King_Slime
member.summary: Hops towards the player and releases Blue Slimes when damaged. Teleports to the player when the player is out of reach; releases Spiked Slimes when damaged in Expert Mode.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Swimming
member.summary: Swims back and forth and moves towards the player if they are in water, except for Goldfish, Gold Goldfish and Pupfish.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Vulture
member.summary: Stands still until player gets within five blocks of AI or it is damaged. AI then acts similarly to the Flying AI.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Jellyfish
member.summary: Floats back and forth, swims towards player in small bursts if player is in water.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Antlion
member.summary: Looks at player, climbs overlapping blocks, shoots falling sand at nearby players.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Spike_Ball
member.summary: Swings in a circle from a pivot point on a chain.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Blazing_Wheel
member.summary: Moves along walls, floors and closed doors.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Hovering
member.summary: Similar to the Fighter AI, floats over the ground instead of jumping.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Flying_Weapon
member.summary: Doesn't adhere to gravity or tile collisions. Spins several times, then heads straight towards the player. Any damage cancels its attack and forces it to spin again.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Bird
member.summary: Stands still until player gets nearby, then flies away. Avoids walls and obstacles and changes direction if one is in the way.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Mimic
member.summary: Stands still until player approaches or attacks, then leaps towards them with varying heights.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Unicorn
member.summary: Slowly gains speed while moving, jumps over obstacles.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Wall_of_Flesh
member.summary: Wall of Flesh Mouth with Wall image attached. Traverses the world horizontally. Also spawns with two Wall of Flesh Eyes which share its health.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Wall_of_Flesh_Eye
member.summary: Bound to an entity, watches player, and shoots projectiles. The more damaged it is, the more it shoots.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.The_Hungry
member.summary: Similar to the Plant AI, but attached to an entity.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Retinazer
member.summary: Alternates between attempting to stay diagonally above player while shooting projectiles slowly, and attempting to stay beside player and shooting projectiles very rapidly.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Spazmatism
member.summary: Alternates between shooting projectiles and staying beside player, and charging toward player.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Skeletron_Prime_Head
member.summary: Same as Head AI.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Prime_Saw
member.summary: Occasionally charges at the player, heads directly towards player when enraged.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Prime_Vice
member.summary: Occasionally charges at the player, rapidly charges when enraged.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Prime_Cannon
member.summary: Fires bombs upwards, aims directly at player when enraged.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Prime_Laser
member.summary: Fires projectiles at player, shoots very rapidly when enraged.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.The_Destroyer
member.summary: Similar to Worm AI except it will shoot projectiles from the body and tail and is unable to "fly" in air. It will also release Probes.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Snowman
member.summary: Jumps and runs towards the player, similar to Fighter AI.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Tortoise
member.summary: Crawls a bit, then leaps towards player. Will indefinitely leap towards the player in water.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Spider
member.summary: Capable of climbing background walls as well as through platforms. Used only when crawling on a wall. Without a wall listed enemies seamlessly transform into their walking variants, which use Fighter AI.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Herpling
member.summary: Jumps high and attempts to land on the player. It can strafe to the sides in midair.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Lost_Girl
member.summary: Turns into a Nymph when a player gets too close.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Queen_Bee
member.summary: Alternates between attempting to stay above player while firing projectiles downwards or spawning bees, and charging back and forth very rapidly.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Flying_Fish
member.summary: Flies straight towards player.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Golem_Body
member.summary: Jumps towards player every few seconds, shoots lasers.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Golem_Head
member.summary: Bound to an entity.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Golem_Fist
member.summary: Flies towards player, returns when hit.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Free_Golem_Head
member.summary: Attempts to fly back and forth, shoots projectiles at player.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Angry_Nimbus
member.summary: Attempts to stay directly above the player, and fires projectiles downwards.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Spore
member.summary: Drifts downwards while following player, destroyed on contact.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Plantera
member.summary: Clings to nearby blocks, chases player, fires projectiles and spiky balls that bounce around.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Plantera_Hook
member.summary: Moves forward briefly before latching onto a block.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Plantera_Tentacle
member.summary: Acts very similar to the Plant AI, only bound to a certain entity.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Brain_of_Cthulhu
member.summary: Doesn't adhere to gravity or tile collisions, and teleports occasionally in first form. Once all Creepers are killed, it will begin rapidly teleporting and moving towards the player.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Creeper
member.summary: Circles around an entity, charging at player.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Dungeon_Spirit
member.summary: Moves directly towards player, gaining momentum. Emits blueish particles.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Mourning_Wood
member.summary: Moves towards player, stops, and fires projectiles straight at the player.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Pumpking
member.summary: Very similar to the Head AI. Spawns with two Pumpking Scythes.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Pumpking_Scythe
member.summary: Very similar to the Skeletron Hand AI.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Ice_Queen
member.summary: Flies around, shooting a barrage of ice-based projectiles.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Santank
member.summary: Moves across the ground, stops moving, and launches many different types of projectiles.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Elf_Copter
member.summary: Attempts to fly around the player, shooting bullets rapidly if they are in sight.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Flocko
member.summary: Flies towards the player at high speed.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Firefly
member.summary: Flies slowly in any direction and occasionally glows.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Butterfly
member.summary: Flies slowly in any direction.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Passive_Worm
member.summary: Moves along the ground, pause for a bit, then continue moving. Will avoid walls and moves in the other direction if it has hit one.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Snail
member.summary: Acts similarly to the Passive Worm AI, but climbs up walls instead of moving away.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Duck
member.summary: Swims on water and walks on land. Will fly away when a player is nearby, but only while swimming. Lands after flying for a while.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Duke_Fishron
member.summary: Rams player multiple times before summoning entities. In second form, it flies in circles and summons entities.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Detonating_Bubble
member.summary: Flies through the air, chases player, and disappears after a period of time. Explodes and deals damage if it succeeds in reaching player.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Sharkron
member.summary: Follows an arcing path, dies when it touches a wall or player.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Bubble_Shield
member.summary: Created by the Martian Officer, absorbs all damage dealt to the officer.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Tesla_Turret
member.summary: Built by Martian Engineers on the ground.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Corite
member.summary: Travels through blocks, charges at the player.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Rider
member.summary: Has a Rider and a corresponding mount, if one is destroyed the other keeps attacking.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Martian_Saucer
member.summary: Flies around the player, fires a Death Ray straight down, can only be damaged if all four turrets have been destroyed.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Moon_Lord_Core
member.summary: Positions behind the player, invulnerable until the Moon Lord's head and hands are defeated.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Moon_Lord_Hand
member.summary: Flees to the left and right of the player, opens and closes, fires Phantasmal Spheres, Phantasmal Eyes, and Phantasmal Bolts. Spawns True Eye of Cthulhu when health is depleted.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Moon_Lord_Head
member.summary: Flies above the player, shoots a Phantasmal Deathray and then some Phantasmal Bolts, spawns True Eye of Cthulhu when defeated.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Martian_Probe
member.summary: Floats at a constant height, turns red and files away if the player gets near it, triggers the Martian Madness event if it gets off screen.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.True_Eye_of_Cthulhu
member.summary: Flies around the Moon Lord, shoots Phantasmal Sphere, Phantasmal Deathray, Phantasmal Eye and Phantasmal Bolts at the player.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Moon_Leech_Clot
member.summary: Travels from the player to the Moon Lord's head, heals part of the Moon Lord for 1000 HP if it reaches the mouth.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Lunatic_Devote
member.summary: Never moves, causes the Lunatic Cultist to spawn when all are killed.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Lunatic_Cultist
member.summary: Teleports around the player, fires shadow fireballs, ice mist, fireballs and lighting orbs. Creates duplicates of itself and summons Phantasm Dragons and Ancient Visions, triggers Lunar events when defeated.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Star_Cell
member.summary: Flies around the player, slowly floats towards them. Usually sticks to the player.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Ancient_Vision
member.summary: Flies around the player, does not adhere to gravity or tile collisions.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Biome_Mimic
member.summary: Passive until approached by the player. Attacks by jumping, dashing rapidly, and jumping into the air and slamming down on the player, ignoring block collision. Periodically "shuts" and becomes immune to damage and reflects projectiles in Expert Mode.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Mothron
member.summary: Flies through blocks, lunges at the player, occasionally lays a Mothron Egg.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Mothron_Egg
member.summary: Doesn't move, spawns Baby Mothrons after a while.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Baby_Mothron
member.summary: Spawns from Mothron Eggs, flies, lunges at the player.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Granite_Elemental
member.summary: Floats towards the player, passing through tiles if the player is far enough. Drops to the ground when hurt in Expert mode.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Target_Dummy
member.summary: Stationary, recoils when damaged.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Flying_Dutchman
member.summary: Floats about the player, is defeated when all 4 cannons are destroyed.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Celestial_Pillar
member.summary: Bobs up and down in place, can only be damaged when 100 / 150 of its event enemies are defeated. Triggers Moon Lord to spawn when all 4 are defeated.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Small_Star_Cell
member.summary: Remains stationary, eventually grows into a full sized star cell.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Flow_Invader
member.summary: Floats around the player, summons 3 orbiting minions, fires projectiles at the player.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Nebula_Floater
member.summary: Floats around the player, summons 3 orbiting minions, charges at the player and fires laser while teleporting.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Unknown_1
member.summary: Stays still and shoots fire.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Solar_Fragment
member.summary: Spawned from the top of the Solar Pillar. Shot upward on spawn and gradually falls down to the ground, destroyed on contact with blocks or the player.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Ancient_Light
member.summary: Fired in spreads of five by the Lunatic Cultist.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Ancient_Doom
member.summary: Spawned from Lunatic Cultist in Expert Mode, fires 4 projectiles in a "+" shape when defeated/summoned.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Sand_Elemental
member.summary: Floats around, moving towards the player, and occasionally spawns three 'sandnados'. Gets faster the more it is damaged.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Sand_Shark
member.summary: Hides under sand (and its variants), occasionally dashes at the player.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Unknown_2
member.summary: Currently, no NPCs follow this AI. Its specifics are unknown.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Eternia_Crystal
member.summary: Stays still, targeted by Old One's Army monsters, ends the Old One's Army event if health reaches 0.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Mysterious_Portal
member.summary: Spawns Etherian enemies.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Attacker
member.summary: Moves towards the Eternia Crystal to attack it, and floats through blocks if it can't reach the crystal.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Flying_Attacker
member.summary: Flies above the Eternia Crystal, pauses, and then dives for it. The cycle then repeats.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Dark_Mage
member.summary: Slowly moves towards the Eternia Crystal. Occasionally summons multiple Old One's Skeletons around it and heals enemies.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Betsy
member.summary: AI behaves similarly to the Duke Fishron AI. Shoots fireballs and rarely sweeps over the crystal with Flame Breath.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Etherian_Lightning_Bug
member.summary: AI behaves similarly to the Hovering AI. Shoots lightning below it repeatedly.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Fairy
member.summary: Moves towards the player, floats around them if no treasure is nearby, moves towards nearby treasure if detected, then waits for the player to go near it, despawns when on top of treasure.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Windy_Balloon
member.summary: Spawns attached to an entity, floats up and down along with attached entity, rapidly flies up if attached entity dies, dies if it hits a block.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Dragonfly
member.summary: Flies in bursts in random directions, flies away at fast speeds if a player approaches.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Ladybug
member.summary: Alternates between flying slowly in any direction and walking back and forth on the ground.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Water_Strider
member.summary: Glides on water and hops on land.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Dreadnautilus
member.summary: Cycles between firing blood projectiles at the player, charging and spinning around the player, and summoning Blood Squids.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Seahorse
member.summary: Swims in bursts in random directions.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Angry_Dandelion
member.summary: Doesn't move, shoots projectiles at nearby players, but only in the windâ€™s direction.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Empress_of_Light
member.summary: Hovers slightly above the player, cycles between several projectile attacks and charging the player. Disappears and reappears at half health, and starts cycling through attacks faster. Enrages during the daytime.

member.name: F:PegasusLib.ID.NPCAIStyleID.Queen_Slime
member.summary: Cycles between performing hops, leaping towards the player to pound them, and firing Regal Gel. Grows wings at half health, and begins flying towards the player's position, firing Regal Gel and attempting to pound the player when above them. Spawns Crystal Slimes, Heavenly Slimes, and Bouncy Slimes when damaged.

member.name: P:PegasusLib.AutoKeybind.Current
member.summary: Returns true if this keybind is pressed currently. Useful for creating a behavior that relies on the keybind being held down.

member.name: P:PegasusLib.AutoKeybind.JustPressed
member.summary: Returns true if this keybind has just been pressed this update. This is a fire-once-per-press behavior.

member.name: P:PegasusLib.AutoKeybind.JustReleased
member.summary: Returns true if this keybind has just been released this update.

member.name: P:PegasusLib.AutoKeybind.Old
member.summary: Returns true if this keybind has been pressed during the previous update.

member.name: M:PegasusLib.MathUtils.MatrixMult(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Vector2,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Vector2,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Vector2)
member.summary: Multiplies a vector by a matrix
member.param: the vector used to determine the x component of the output
the vector used to determine the y component of the output

member.name: P:PegasusLib.Networking.SyncedAction.ServerOnly
member.summary: In multiplayer, this is used to determine whether or not the action runs on clients Return true for anything that should only be run by the process that handles NPCs, the world, etc.
